textAfterTable: Exclusivity Data Appl No Prod No Exclusivity Code Exclusivity Expiration N022187 002 NPP Mar 26, 2015 Additional information: Patents are published upon receipt by the Orange Book Staff and may not reflect the official receipt date as described in 21 CFR 314.53(d)(5). Patents listed prior to August 18, 2003 are flagged with method of use claims only as applicable and submitted by the sponsor. These patents may not be flagged with respect to other claims which may apply.
